00004 // Created : 2009-03-06
00005 // Updated : 2013-04-09
00006 // Licence : This source is under MIT License
00007 // File    : glm/gtx/gradient_paint.inl
00009 
00010 namespace glm
00011 {
00012         template <typename T, precision P>
00013         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T radialGradient
00014         (
00015                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Center,
00016                 T const & Radius,
00017                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Focal,
00018                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Position
00019         )
00020         {
00021                 detail::tvec2<T, P> F = Focal - Center;
00022                 detail::tvec2<T, P> D = Position - Focal;
00023                 T Radius2 = pow2(Radius);
00024                 T Fx2 = pow2(F.x);
00025                 T Fy2 = pow2(F.y);
00026 
00027                 T Numerator = (D.x * F.x + D.y * F.y) + sqrt(Radius2 * (pow2(D.x) + pow2(D.y)) - pow2(D.x * F.y - D.y * F.x));
00028                 T Denominator = Radius2 - (Fx2 + Fy2);
00029                 return Numerator / Denominator;
00030         }
00031 
00032         template <typename T, precision P>
00033         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T linearGradient
00034         (
00035                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Point0,
00036                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Point1,
00037                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Position
00038         )
00039         {
00040                 detail::tvec2<T, P> Dist = Point1 - Point0;
00041                 return (Dist.x * (Position.x - Point0.x) + Dist.y * (Position.y - Point0.y)) / glm::dot(Dist, Dist);
00042         }
00043 }//namespace glm
